p: Adult carmine spider mites ( Tetranychus cinnabarinus (Boisduval)) that were used for bioassay had been raised in the laboratory for over 10 years without any pesticide exposure. The mites were reared on cowpea seedlings (Vigna unguiculata) in a growth chamber at 26 ± 1 °C and 75–80% relative humidity under a 14 h light/10 h dark cycle.
